name: activity-tracker-pro
description: Comprehensive activity tracking platform for development and advocacy projects

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist

author: Will
